# my-button-component

A simple button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description        | Type                       | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------ | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Type of the button | `"primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                      |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `"default"` | The slot containing the text shown on the button |


## Shadow Parts

| Part       | Description                                   |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `"button"` | The css shadow root part to target the button |
